Posts.Content: Jan 30, 2009 07:21AM maryfan wrote: Hi Pam. just remember this will be your worst week. once you get a teatment plan you will feel much stronger. It is two years since my diagnosis and two things I will say   1. people will be very kind.....accept all offers of help   2.B. C. is not all bad. My life has changed for the better in many ways. Yours can be too !    Let us know how you get on. Sharing does lighten the load.
